item.title: Blame it on the MUJI
item.author: Emma Laurin,
item.description: The events that took place on 11 March 2011 in Japan were a wake up call for many people. 20,000 died and hundreds of thousands were stranded without homes. This major disaster served as an eye opener for Japan: it made people appreciate the everyday things that surround us and those moments that â€¦
